class.name: TileMapLayerGroup
class.brief_description: Groups a set of tile map layers together, allowing them to share a provided [TileSet].
class.description: Groups together tile map layers as part or the same map, replacing the [TileMap] node. Child layers will use this node's [member tile_set]. The editor also uses [TileMapLayerGroup] as a way to store which layers are selected in a given group. This allows highlighting the currently selected layers.

members.member: The assigned [TileSet]. This TileSet will be applied to all child layers.
